businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî a Singapore-based global internet company.
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a global technology company headquartered in Singapore, operating three core businesses across Southeast Asia, Latin America, Taiwan, and beyond: e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee, formerly SeaMoney). On a TTM basis through 2025, revenue reached $21.04B (+35.8% YoY) with net income of $1.42B, completing a full profitability turnaround. On February 19, 2026, Sea expanded its strategic AI partnership MOU with Google, driving AI innovation across e-commerce, gaming, and fintech. The Q4 2025 earnings report is scheduled for March 3 ‚Äî now 8 days away.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce platform commissions, advertising revenue, logistics (SPX Express) fees ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: In-game virtual item sales from Free Fire and other titles, plus publishing revenue ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2% YoY), bookings $775M (+51% YoY)
Monee (formerly SeaMoney): Digital payments (ShopeePay), consumer/SME lending (SPayLater), digital banking (SeaBank), insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8% YoY)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Latin America (52% of SEA GMV in 2024, up from 48% in 2023)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale game (Q3 2025 bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay ‚Äî Digital payment and financial services platform (loan book $7.9B, +70% YoY; Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia and the Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E Ratio (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on TTM EPS of $2.29. Reasonable for a high-growth internet company, though elevated in absolute terms.

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E (FY2026E)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on consensus EPS of $4.25 (FY2026E). PEG of 0.45 makes the valuation attractive relative to the growth rate.

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth (YoY)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Shopee +36.6%, Monee +60.8%, Garena +31.2%. All three segments growing at 30%+.

keyMetrics.name: Operating Margin
keyMetrics.interpretation: Significantly improved from FY2024's 3.94%. Scale economies and logistics internalization benefits are taking effect.

keyMetrics.name: Free Cash Flow
keyMetrics.interpretation: FCF margin 18.5%. Nine-month cumulative FCF of $4.6B (+80% YoY).

keyMetrics.name: Debt-to-Equity
keyMetrics.interpretation: Net cash of $5.66B (~$9.56 per share). Very healthy balance sheet.

keyMetrics.name: ROE / ROIC
keyMetrics.interpretation: Improving rapidly since the profitability turnaround. Net income $1.42B (+1,358% YoY).

growthDrivers.title: Shopee's e-commerce dominance expanding ‚Äî 52% of SEA GMV in 2024
growthDrivers.description: Southeast Asian e-commerce GMV share rose to 52% in 2024 (up from 48% in 2023, +4pp). Shopee captured $12B of the total $14B in new GMV added, demonstrating overwhelming growth leadership. Q3 2025 GMV of $32.2B (+28% YoY) marked a fifth consecutive all-time high. Ad revenue grew +70% YoY, with SPX Express logistics internalization driving efficiency. Shopee raised commission rates in Brazil, signaling a pivot toward profitability. Southeast Asia e-commerce GMV is projected to reach $230B in 2026.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI strategic partnership ‚Äî agentic shopping prototype and AP2 payment protocol
growthDrivers.description: Signed an expanded MOU with Google on February 19, 2026. Shopee: Gemini-powered agentic shopping prototype in development. Garena: AI-driven game development innovation. Monee: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) adoption. OpenAI tools also being integrated in parallel.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (fintech) hyper-growth ‚Äî Off-Shopee SPayLater surging +300% YoY
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 revenue +60.8% YoY, loan book $7.9B (+70% YoY), 90-day NPL ratio stable at 1.1%. Active lending users surpassed 28M. Off-Shopee SPayLater (payments outside Shopee platform) growing 300% YoY, accelerating Monee's evolution into an independent fintech platform. Addressing Southeast Asia's 450M unbanked population.

growthDrivers.title: Garena/Free Fire bookings rebound ‚Äî IP collaboration strategy pays off
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 bookings of $775M (+51% YoY) marked the best quarter since 2021. IP collaborations with Squid Game, Naruto, and others improved bookings per user by 40%.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: The integrated ecosystem spanning Southeast Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech is the core competitive advantage. Cross-synergies between Shopee, Monee, and Garena, plus the proprietary logistics network (SPX Express), form significant barriers to entry. With 52% GMV share in 2024, Shopee has widened its lead over #2 TikTok Shop (~18%).

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network and the SPX Express logistics network create powerful network effects. 52% of Southeast Asian GMV in 2024, up from 48% the prior year.

A super app ecosystem flowing from e-commerce (Shopee) to payments (ShopeePay) to financial services (Monee) to entertainment (Garena). Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY is expanding the ecosystem's reach beyond the core platform.
Language, payments, logistics, and regulatory compliance optimized for each of 11 Southeast Asian markets. Strong local advantage versus Temu and Amazon.
Unified utilization of e-commerce, payments, lending, and gaming data for AI-powered personalization. Further strengthened by the Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: Firmly established as #2 in Southeast Asian e-commerce with ~17.6-18% GMV share in 2024, overtaking Lazada. Strong in live commerce.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: Dropped to #3 in Southeast Asian e-commerce, overtaken by TikTok Shop. Continuing to lose share to Shopee.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-price cross-border e-commerce in Southeast Asia and Brazil. MAU surging +55%.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: #1 Latin American e-commerce and fintech. Competes directly with Shopee in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: Southeast Asian super app. Indirect competition with Monee in fintech.

recentNews.headline: Bullish options activity detected ‚Äî 4,309 call contracts (1.7x expected), put/call ratio 0.29
recentNews.significance: SE call option volume surged to 4,309 contracts on 2/19, 1.7x the expected level. Put/call ratio of 0.29 signals extremely bullish positioning. Institutional options market concentrating upside bets ahead of Q4 earnings on 3/3.

recentNews.headline: Sea Limited expands strategic AI partnership MOU with Google
recentNews.significance: Shopee: Gemini-powered agentic shopping prototype. Garena: AI-driven game development innovation. Monee: AP2 payment protocol adoption. Sea CEO Forrest Li: 'AI is the next great technological revolution.'

recentNews.headline: Shopee raises commission rates in Brazil, prioritizing monetization over expansion
recentNews.significance: Fee hikes signal a strategic shift from growth-at-all-costs to sustainable profitability. A positive near-term margin signal amid increased investment spending.

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 and FY2025 earnings date announced ‚Äî March 3 (D-8)
recentNews.significance: Consensus Q4 2025 revenue $6.78B, EPS $0.80. Whether FY2025E total revenue of $23.12B (+37.4% YoY) is achieved will be the key focus. Now 8 days to earnings.

recentNews.headline: Morgan Stanley lowers SE target from $209 to $173 (maintains Overweight)
recentNews.significance: Target reduced on near-term margin pressure concerns from growth investments. However, maintains Shopee GMV 20%+ growth outlook.

analystOpinions.notableComment: 11 of 12 analysts rate Buy (6 Strong Buy, 5 Buy). Morgan Stanley Overweight $173 (lowered), BofA Buy $150 (lowered), Barclays Buy $226 (street high). StockAnalysis 12-analyst consensus at $189 (+64.7%). Price targets are trending lower but Buy ratings remain intact. Bullish options activity on 2/19 (4,309 call contracts, put/call 0.29) signals institutional upside bets. Q4 earnings on 3/3 is the key rerating catalyst.

risks.title: Intensifying e-commerce competition ‚Äî TikTok Shop now firmly #2 in Southeast Asia
risks.description: TikTok Shop has secured ~17.6-18% of Southeast Asian GMV in 2024, overtaking Lazada to become the clear #2. Accelerating its chase of Shopee via live commerce strengths. Temu is surging with an ultra-low-price strategy, MAU +55%.

risks.title: Shopee EBITDA margin moving the wrong direction ‚Äî Q3 at 0.6% (down from Q2's 0.8%)
risks.description: Shopee's EBITDA margin compressed from 0.8% in Q2 to 0.6% in Q3, moving away from the long-term 2-3% target. Whether this margin pressure from growth investments is structural or temporary requires close monitoring.

risks.title: Single-game dependency on Free Fire
risks.description: Garena revenue is overwhelmingly concentrated in Free Fire. IP collaborations drove a near-term rebound, but the gaming segment could decline again without new titles.

risks.title: Technical weakness ‚Äî trading below key moving averages
risks.description: Currently at $115.00, below both the 50-day SMA ($129) and 200-day SMA ($154). Down 42% from the 52-week high of $199.30.

risks.title: Monee credit quality and regulatory risk
risks.description: Rapid loan book expansion to $7.9B (+70% YoY) raises potential credit deterioration concerns. 90-day NPL at 1.1% is stable but could spike in a downturn.

buyReasons.title: Deeply undervalued ‚Äî 65% upside to consensus
buyReasons.rationale: At $115.00, the average analyst target of $189 implies 64.7% upside. Forward P/E of 27x with PEG of 0.45. 11 of 12 analysts rate Buy.

buyReasons.title: Profitability turnaround accelerating ‚Äî FCF $3.9B, net cash $5.7B, $1B buyback
buyReasons.rationale: TTM operating margin 8.2%, FCF $3.9B (18.5% margin), net cash $5.66B. $1B share buyback program underway. Net income $1.42B (+1,358% YoY).

buyReasons.title: Shopee GMV share expanding to 52% + Google AI partnership super app synergies
buyReasons.rationale: Southeast Asian GMV share rose from 48% to 52% in 2024, capturing $12B of $14B in new GMV. Google AI MOU enables agentic shopping and AP2 payment innovation. Off-Shopee SPayLater growing +300% YoY, expanding fintech beyond the core platform.

buyReasons.title: Bullish options signal + Q4 earnings (3/3, D-8) as catalyst
buyReasons.rationale: Call volume of 4,309 contracts on 2/19 (1.7x expected), put/call ratio 0.29 signals concentrated institutional upside bets. Meeting Q4 revenue consensus of $6.78B could trigger a sharp rebound.

overallOpinion: Delivering simultaneous 38% high growth + profitability turnaround (operating margin 8.2%, FCF $3.9B, net income +1,358% YoY)
Shopee's SEA GMV share expanded from 48% to 52%, capturing $12B of $14B in new GMV ‚Äî dominance accelerating
42% discount from 52-week high, 65% upside to consensus, PEG 0.45 + 2/19 call volume surged 1.7x (bullish signal)
TikTok Shop firmly #2 (~18%), Shopee EBITDA margin slipping to 0.6% in Q3, and technical weakness pose near-term risks
Q4 2025 earnings on 3/3 (D-8) is the key catalyst for rerating ‚Äî a dollar-cost averaging approach is warranted
